original_text: For the work of a man shall he render unto him, and cause every man to find according to his ways.
korean_text: 사람의 행위를 따라 갚으사 각각 그의 행위대로 받게 하시나니

sentences.original_text: For the work of a man shall he render unto him
and cause every man to find according to his ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 사람이 그의 길에 따라 받게 하리라
